desc: Simpalo Snacks delivers healthy office snacks on your schedule. We offer one time purchases, weekly, and monthly snack delivery options with no contracts. Customized solutions available that fit your employee wellness program needs. Check out our variety snack boxes now!

layout.text: Keep everyone happy, healthy and productive with our office snack delivery & fresh fruit delivery service. Your team can even choose their own snacks, now that is outstanding service!
We are able to deliver snacks for your employees, clients, friends and family, with a personal touch, such as messages, customized logos and packaging!
